description: Episode of Series "Through Australian eyes". Depicts the experiences of Australian children of various ethnic backgrounds in the country where their parents were born. "Yugoslavia": Duska Franic discovers her large extended family when visiting her parents' birthplace in the beautiful Croatian countryside. "Hungary": Debbie Karp journeys to Budapest, her mother's birthplace. She visits relatives and tours Hungary on a voyage of discovery.
related_objects: Series; S01016; Through Australian eyes; Active; 1983
